summary: Ten years of complete exploration experience, from regional evaluation to prospect & well maturation to multi-well operations. In a variety of geological settings ranging from onshore unconventionals to shallow water carbonates to deep water turbidities. Strong technical integrator with extensive cross-discipline knowledge. Catalyst that enjoys mobilizing and inspiring others to start new projects by putting ideas into action.
